title: Systems Administrator Job Announcement
body:
<!--StartFragment-->

8/13/25 - Professional Services Contract Announcement:  

Systems Administrator 

San Juan County Fire Protection District No. 3 (SJIF&R) is seeking a qualified individual to provide professional services as a Systems Administrator. This position is contracted through a professional services contract, invoiced monthly and paid net-30.  

Position Details 

• Title: Contract Systems Administrator 

• Location: Hybrid (Remote and On-Site at 1011 Mullis St, Friday Harbor, WA 98250) 

• Term: Immediately thru August 31, 2026 (with option to renew) 

• Hours: Initial bulk time for orientation and analysis - Up to 20 hours per month thereafter, and on-call as needed 

• Compensation: Time and materials rate negotiable; payable net 30 upon invoice 

Scope of Work 

Responsibilities include network security, systems administration, policy development, user support and training, workflow design and supervision, contract services/products management, backup oversight, and management of hardware/software/cloud storage/remote desktop interfaces. 

Application Instructions 

Interested candidates should submit the following documents: 

1. A one-page Letter of Interest & Intent Including Desired Rate of Pay; one-page only. 

2. A one-page Resume with References and summarized KSA’s; one-page only. 

Please send your application materials to ATTN: Chief Noel Monin, 1011 Mullis St, Friday Harbor, WA 98250 or via email to \[nmonin@sjifire.org]. Applications will be accepted until the position is filled. 

SJIF&R is an equal opportunity employer and encourages applications from all qualified individuals.
